item.title: My First Custom Keyboard - Learnings & Advice to Newbies
item.description: When Auckland went into lock-down in August 2021, I decided to get myself a custom keyboard after being suckered in by various videos by Glarses and Hipyo Tech. I spend so much time at my computer for work and personal projects I thought it’d be a worthwhile endeavour to make something I could enjoy 12+ hours a day.
